text: Linda Aguirre (born July 12, 1951) is a former member of the Arizona State Senate and the Arizona House of Representatives, initially representing the 23rd District before redistricting in 2002 moved her to the 16th District. She was first elected to the House in November 1992. She won re-election to the House in 1994 and 1996. In 1998, she ran for the State Senate in the same district and won the seat. She won re-election in 2000, 2002, and 2004. Due to Arizona term limits, she was ineligible to run for re-election in 2006. ==References== Category:Arizona Democrats Category:Arizona state senators Category:1951 births Category:Living people
title: Linda Aguirre
